content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --BDSYCD
      operator: is_contained_by
      value:
        - MedDRA system organ class code
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0386
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --BDSYCD is not a valid MedDRA system organ class
  code
Outcome:
  Message: --BDSYCD is not a valid MedDRA system organ class code
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0386
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A standardized or dictionary derived short sequence
                  of characters used to represent the body system or organ class. MedDRA
                  System Organ Class code corresponding to --BODSYS assigned for analysis.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --BDSYCD
                Section: Events
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - AE
      - MH
      - CE

json.Description: Trigger error when --BDSYCD is not a valid MedDRA system organ class code

Outcome.Message: --BDSYCD is not a valid MedDRA system organ class code

Citations.Cited_Guidance: A standardized or dictionary derived short sequence of characters used to represent the body system or organ class. MedDRA System Organ Class code corresponding to --BODSYS assigned for analysis.
